name: Vanilla Sky Hair and Body Mist
categories: Fragrance, Women, Body Mist & Hair Mist
about: What it is: A fresh fragrance for your hair and body with notes of cappuccino, pure vanilla, and caramelized cedar...Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Cappuccino, Pure Vanilla, Caramelized Cedar..Fragrance Description: This is a dreamy fine fragrance for your hair and body to spritz wherever life takes you. Vanilla Sky is sensual gourmand fragrance of warm vanilla notes blended with hints of cappuccino. Caramelized cedarwood lies at the base of the fragrance to give a rich golden warmth...About the Bottle: The Skylar Hair and Body Mist is a lightweight plastic bottle made with 30% recycled materials. A portable and convenient size to take with you on-the-go. All Skylar bottles and caps are 100% recyclable...About the Fragrance: Skylar was founded by u2018mompreneuru2019 Cat Chen after her daughteru2019s allergic reaction to her perfume. Dreamy Skylar fragrances are safe for you and safe for everyone around you. They are vegan, cruelty-free, hypoallergenic, and sensitive-skin safe...
ingredients: Organic sugar cane alcohol, Aqua/Water, 1,3-Benzodioxole-5-carboxaldehyde, 1,4-Dioxacycloheptadecane-5,17-dione, 1,6-Nonadien-3-ol, 3,7-dimethyl, 1-Propanol, 2-[1-(3,3-dimethyl-cyclohexyl)ethoxy]-2-methyl-,propanoate, 2(3H)-Furanone, dihydro-5-pentyl, 2H-Pyran-2-one, 6-heptyltetrahydro, 2h-Pyran-4-ol, tetrahydro-4-methyl-2-(2-methylpropyl), 3-Cyclopentene-1-butanol, .alpha.,.beta.,2,2,3-pentamethyl, 4H-Pyran-4-one, 2-ethyl-3-hydroxy, Benzaldehyde, 3-ethoxy-4-hydroxy (powdery note / safe synthetic), Benzaldehyde, 4-hydroxy-3-methoxy , Benzoic acid, 2-hydroxy-, (3Z)-3-hexen-1-yl ester, Cyclododecane, (ethoxymethoxy), Cyclopentaneacetic acid, 3-oxo-2-pentyl-, methyl ester, Ethanone, 1-(1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8-octahydro-2,3,8,8-tetramethyl-2-naphthalenyl), Naphtho[2,1-b]furan, dodecahydro-3a,6,6,9a-tetramethyl, Cedarwood Oil , Propanol, oxybis, Tetradecanoic acid, 1-methylethyl ester, Betaine, Panthenol......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spritz safely on hair, skin, and cotton or polyester fabrics..-Layer multiple Skylar fragrances together to create different possibilities and give your fragrance maximum impact...Recycling Instructions:.-This bottle and cap are 100% recyclable. When bottle is empty, remove cap and pump and wash thoroughly. .-Recycle the bottle and cap and place pump in the trash.

reviews.review_title: Not my fav, but still good

reviews.review_text: Okay so Iu2019ve heard so much hype and good things about the Skylar body mists but knew I would never spend $40.50 CAD on a 80ml body mist. Itu2019s nice but just not worth $40.50. The boardwalk is amazing and I would totally recommend as it smells more unique and special (if youu2019re looking for a more high end body mist) Both are still nice to layer with and the mist is super fine which I like, but I donu2019t think theyu2019re worth $40.50, especially for the size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this stuff and it has become part of my daily routine. I have really terrible reactions (allergies) to strong scents and have sensitive skin so I'm wary about trying body sprays and perfumes out.  But this is nice and light, just a fine mist that hits everything, and the scent is subtle and grown up but reminds me a bit of cotton candy.   It's a nice little secret, as only those close to you get to smell you, but I do notice men in my life (including coworkers) getting closer to me to sniff me a bit sometimes.  I'm loving it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

I think though the price point is not the best for how long this product lasts on you, I layered this spray, so I can combine with other products that do last more on body. Overall great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

Very recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this mist doesn't have a long-lasting scent, because I can use it with my fragrance. The mist absorbs very fast and doesnu2019t leave any sticky feeling after. I used it for a week on my legs and I feel my body hydrated. It is better than oil but does the same work. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I already knew I was going to love this because I own the full size perfume of this scent. Itu2019s the perfect scent for everyday and can be worn year round. The hair & body mist was a great addition to perfume because I love layering scent and normally spray my hair as well. The mist lasted a good 4-5 hours on me and Iu2019m really happy with it. The nozzle on this mist is my favorite feature, itu2019s a fine mist that covers a large area.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Big fan of Skylar perfume. Specially of Vanilla Sky which is my go to perfume in the fall. So I was ecstatic to see they were coming out with a body and hair mist for it. The mist smells just as delicious as the perfume. On me it smells of warm vanilla with hints of amber. Smells almost like angel food cake. I love it. The longevity is pretty good too for a body spray. I've been wearing it for four hours now and can still smell it on myself and hair. This is a great body/hair mist. Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skylar Fragrances Vanilla Sky hair and body spray fragrance is beautiful!! Smells just like their perfume but I must admit that I was super impressed by the stay power of this spray!! Itu2019s light enough but it literally lasted ALL day! I had sooo many compliments even when I went to bed that night i could still smell it as i brushed out my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you love vanilla scent then you are gonna want to grab this vanilla sky body spray from Skylar Beauty. So sweet and delicious smelling! I smell like a snack! It is definitely a must have!! Go get it now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I must say, I'm definitely impressed with Vanilla Sky Hair & Body Mist. It's a fragrance that has managed to hit all the right notes for me, and what's even better is that it's not overwhelming at all.  This scent is a delightful blend of warm vanilla notes with hints of cappuccino and caramelized cedarwood. The combination is simply divine, and it's become my new go-to fragrance. What I particularly love is that the scent lingers in my hair for a long time.The versatility of this product is another standout feature. It's not just a hair mist; it can also be used as a body mist, which is fantastic. Having a product that serves multiple purposes is a win in my book. Plus, it doesn't leave any sticky residue, making it even more appealing.  The lightweight nature of Vanilla Sky Hair & Body Mist is perfect for my daily use. It doesn't weigh me down, and I can confidently spritz it on whether it's for my daily use to  or out for a special occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don't like warm scents because they often smell too sweet, but this one is different. It's crisp and fresh with just the right amount of scent. It subtly stays with me for hours, and I love how it smells on me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super impressed with how good this fragrance smells!! It feels like a warm hug and a fresh baked sugar cookie. Absolutely love how a little of it goes a long way. Definitely worth every single penny!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This scent smells amazing, and itu2019s the perfect mix of sweet orange, bergamot, and vanilla. This formula is also long lasting and very affordable. I get so many compliments on this scent every time I wear it, and it has quickly become my everyday fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so yummy, like walking into a candle shop around fall/winter and smelling the warm spicy sugar cookie kind of scents lol. It immediately reminded me of that, and itu2019ll be great for the holidays and anyone that likes smelling like vanilla with a hint of spice. It lasts a couple hours on the skin and works especially well in hair. Very comforting and universally likable if you generally like scents in this category.

Itu2019s smells great! Itu2019s on the light side so I perfer this to layer. The mist is super fine perfect for applying on your hair. the scents are very luxurious and itu2019s a good price! It would make a great gift!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skylar Clean Beauty's Vanilla Sky Hair & Body Mist reminds me of drinking a cappuccino in a cozy cafe. I really like the vanilla, caramelized cedar, and amber notes. It gives off a very warm, sensual, and sweet scent. It makes me feel like I am in Autumn season. The price value of the mist is good too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband's first reaction when he walked into the room the first time I spritz myself with Skylar Vanilla Sky was what smells like a vanilla cupcake? and he said he really liked it. This is a really nice and sweet gourmand fragrance due to the notes of Pure Vanilla, Cappuccino, and Caramelized Cedar mixed all together to make such an intoxicating scent that makes me think of fall. When I wear this fragrance, it makes me feel warm and cozy, like I'm wrapped up in a warm, snuggly blanket cuddled up on a cold night in front of the fireplace. It's the perfect fragrance to wear on a chilly day or evening when you want to feel cozy and comforted. The vanilla note in Skylar Vanilla Sky is not too sweet or overpowering. It's perfectly balanced by the cappuccino and caramelized cedar notes, which add a touch of sophistication and depth to the fragrance. Overall, I highly recommend Skylar Vanilla Sky to anyone who loves sweet, warm, and cozy fragrances. It's a perfect fragrance for fall and winter, but it can also be worn year-round.

Smells so good! Itu2019s perfect for layering. Itu2019s a lighter fine and airy mist i love how you can use on your hair they have three other awesome scents peach and coconut. I will be picking up the other ones!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This body & hair mist smells amazing! I love how it dispenses from the bottle, very light and easy. The warm vanilla scent isnu2019t too strong and overpowering, but is the perfect amount of vanilla and sweet! It smells so good, especially for colder seasons coming up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: warm and inviting aroma of vanilla

reviews.review_title: warm inviting vanilla - doesn't last long though
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is only a body mist, but still a pretty good value considering the rollerball perfume is already $30. Packaging is very sturdy, thick plastic. Its a 2.7 fl oz bottle which is convenient enough to throw into the bag on the go. Unlike Coconut Cove, Vanilla Sky does not perform as long on my skin, but no headaches with this one. I get less than an hour of wear time before it becomes a skin scent. This body mist smells a lot like a milder warm vanilla sugar scent iykwim. Not the biggest fan of straight up vanilla scents, but I can see myself layering this with some of my favorite fall and winter scents like black opium. If you're looking for a warm vanilla scent, this is one to try! Side note, the first ingredient is organic sugar cane alcohol, idk if prolonged use in hair as hair mist will dry it out, so recommend to use mainly as body mist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
